entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as a person who doesn't believe Harry's claim. He is described as going down the stone steps beyond a door to his right.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to convince Cedric of something. He is described as facing competitors with more magical education than him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who might believe Harry's claim, along with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who might believe Harry's claim, along with Ron.

entities.name: the four champions
entities.description: The Four Champions are a group of people competing in the tournament. They are described as having more magical education than Harry.

relationships.description: Harry and Cedric have a conversation where Cedric doesn't believe Harry's claim.
Ron might believe Harry's claim, unlike Cedric.
Hermione might believe Harry's claim, like Ron.
Harry is competing against the Four Champions in the tournament.
